description: The same two people, now cooking together, chopping vegetables and stirring a pot.
text:
Woman: This looks delicious.
Man: I'm learning so much from you.

description: The two people, now sitting at a table, eating the meal they cooked together.
text:
Man: This is amazing!
Woman: Thank you, I'm glad you like it.

description: The two people, now cleaning up the kitchen together, washing dishes and putting away groceries.
text:
Woman: I had a great time cooking with you.
Man: Me too, we should do this again sometime.

description: The two people, now sitting on a couch together, watching a movie and eating popcorn.
text:
Man: I'm glad we decided to cook together.
Woman: Me too, it was a lot of fun.

description: The two people, now in their pajamas, lying in bed together, asleep.
